main event: A witness in Fairborn, Ohio reported seeing four bright lights in the sky moving in a circular pattern late at night in 1967.
interesting points: The witness described the lights appearing like stars and moving with approximately 60 seconds between each pass., The witness noted that they did not hear any unusual sounds., They compared the size of the lights to a large star., The report does not contain a photograph., The observation was related to Project Blue Book.
sighted object: four bright lights in the sky
witness description: The witness stated they could not explain what they saw and only perceived the lights as stars.
